item.title: Here's what will happen in 2018 election (POLL)
item.description: Do you think Democrats will retake the House, the Senate, or both in the 2018 election? [socialpoll id="2479812”] Now that you’ve answered, let’s consider the limits of data science in 2018. The best data scientists in the world agreed with nearly absolute certainty. These scientists determined, beyond a reasonable doubt, that Hillary Clinton would be the 45th President of the United States. That was in 2016. Those scientists were wrong.
